attributes.action: Stop the ban of xl bully’s breed and bring in punishment for irresponsible owner
attributes.additional_details: The xl bully has had bad reputation recently for all the news around attacks , most of the attacks being caused by the owner not being able to control the dog or have it trained , most xls are big softies and want nothing but loving and wouldn’t hurt a fly
attributes.background: Bring in laws against puppy farms , bring in paperwork for breeders and a ban on backyard breeding

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action:  https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643611
